= surpass | BrE səˈpɑːs, AmE sərˈpæs | [[/wordsi|<- Back to List]] =

`超出`

A.transitive verb

① (be better than) 胜过 shèngguo

▸ to surpass sb/sth in sth;

在某方面优于某人/某物

▸ a performance that far surpasses all others

远远优于其他人的表演

② (go beyond) 超出 chāochū ‹expectation, level, record›

B.to surpass oneself reflexive verb

超越自我 chāoyuè zìwǒ

▸ the chef has surpassed himself with this dessert

这位厨师在这道甜点上发挥超常
